content: from the hook single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 3sc in last chain working back along the opposite side of the chain single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet slip st to the first single_crochet 10 round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in the same st 2sc in the next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet 2sc in the next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in the last two single_crochet slip st to the first single_crochet 16 round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st 2sc in the next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in the next 5 single_crochet 2sc in the next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in the last 4 single_crochet slip st to the first single_crochet 22 round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in the back loop of each single_crochet around slip st to first single_crochet 22 round 6 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around slip st to first single_crochet 22 round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in next 10 single_crochet hdc2tog * decrease repeat from * two more times hdc2tog single_crochet in the last single_crochet slip st to first single_crochet 17 round 8 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in the next 9 single_crochet hdc2tog dc3tog hdc2tog slip st to first single_crochet 14 round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in each single_crochet around slip st to first single_crochet 14 finish off leaving long tail stuff the foot and sew and sew to body see picture for placement embroider mouth see picture for placement
